name: Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1%
description: A serum that helps reduce shine and improve the look of pores, ideal for oily and combination skin.

name: Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5
description: A hydrating serum that helps skin retain moisture, ideal for dry and sensitive skin.

name: Caffeine Solution 5% + EGCG
description: A lightweight eye serum that helps reduce the look of puffiness, ideal for all skin types including sensitive.

name: Hyalu B5 Serum
description: A hydrating serum that supports barrier comfort, ideal for dry and sensitive skin.

name: Pure Vitamin C10 Serum
description: A brightening serum that helps improve uneven tone, ideal for normal and combination skin.

name: 10% Azelaic Acid Booster
description: A booster that helps reduce redness and uneven tone, ideal for sensitive and combination skin.

name: 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant
description: A leave-on exfoliant that helps unclog pores and reduce blackheads, ideal for oily and combination skin.

name: Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Essence
description: A hydrating essence-serum that supports repair without heaviness, ideal for sensitive and combination skin.

name: Hyaluronic Acid Serum
description: A simple hydration serum that helps skin feel smoother, ideal for dry and sensitive skin.

name: Retinol Serum
description: A retinol serum that helps improve texture over time, ideal for normal to oily skin when introduced gradually.

name: Glow Serum
description: A glow-boosting serum that supports oil balance, ideal for oily and combination skin.

name: Calm + Restore Triple Oat Serum
description: A soothing serum that helps reduce dryness discomfort, ideal for sensitive and dry skin.

name: Hydrating B5 Gel
description: A lightweight hydration gel that supports moisture levels, ideal for dry and sensitive skin.

name: Midnight Recovery Concentrate
description: A night oil-serum that supports softness and comfort, ideal for dry skin (avoid if very fragrance-sensitive).

name: Mineral 89 Hyaluronic Acid Booster
description: A daily hydrating booster that helps reduce tightness, ideal for dry and sensitive skin.
